Text: I hate when people put all these rar files up, no one wants to extract all this crap in 4 minute intervals.

4 minute intervals for rar files? How old a computer are you using? On my Dual Quad-Core Intel Xeons, they unrar in maybe a second or two and the whole thing is done in under 10 seconds. Just go upgrade please.

Way to fail, having the show in rars doesn't even reduce the size at all, look here, it's even ~0.01 MiB less and it's not in fucking rars : http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7371862/Futurama.S07E02.720p.HDTV.x264-IMMERSE_[PublicHD]#filelistContainer
